vulnerability_findings.name: reentrancy-eth
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function withdrawBalance() public {
        require(!lock[msg.sender]); // Check if the sender is already in the process of withdrawing
        lock[msg.sender] = true; // Set the sender to be in the process of withdrawing
        uint amountToWithdraw = userBalances[msg.sender];
        userBalances[msg.sender] = 0; // Set the balance to be withdrawn to zero before the external call
        require(msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()); // Perform the external call
        lock[msg.sender] = false; // Set the sender to be done withdrawing
vulnerability_findings.message:
Reentrancy in Reentrancy_secure.withdrawBalance (patch_1.sol#7-14):
	External calls:
	- require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()) (patch_1.sol#12)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- lock (patch_1.sol#13)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function withdrawBalance() public {
        require(!lock[msg.sender]); // Check if the sender is already in the process of withdrawing
        lock[msg.sender] = true; // Set the sender to be in the process of withdrawing
        uint amountToWithdraw = userBalances[msg.sender];
        userBalances[msg.sender] = 0; // Set the balance to be withdrawn to zero before the external call
        require(msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()); // Perform the external call
        lock[msg.sender] = false; // Set the sender to be done withdrawing

vulnerability_findings.name: solc-version
vulnerability_findings.message:
Detected issues with version pragma in patch_1.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.0 (patch_1.sol#1): it allows old versions

vulnerability_findings.name: low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.vulnerability_code:
function withdrawBalance() public {
        require(!lock[msg.sender]); // Check if the sender is already in the process of withdrawing
        lock[msg.sender] = true; // Set the sender to be in the process of withdrawing
        uint amountToWithdraw = userBalances[msg.sender];
        userBalances[msg.sender] = 0; // Set the balance to be withdrawn to zero before the external call
        require(msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()); // Perform the external call
        lock[msg.sender] = false; // Set the sender to be done withdrawing
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in Reentrancy_secure.withdrawBalance (patch_1.sol#7-14):
	-require(bool)(msg.sender.call.value(amountToWithdraw)()) patch_1.sol#12

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
